channel.title: the andrew rogers webzone - Andrew Rogers

item.title: Now Open Source: Hamlet: The Movie: The Game
item.description: The first in a project to open source all my old software.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rogers

item.title: Source Map Analyzer
item.description: A tool for taking Source maps, VPK files, and the proper FGDs, and outputting a report on what you need to do to get it to work.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rogers

item.title: My Own Personal Soundcloud Archive
item.description: A backup of all the rather mediocre tracks that populated my SoundCloud.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rogers

item.title: Cliperizer
item.description: Tool to easily extract clips from longer videos.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rogers

item.title: Command Line Image Utilities
item.description: A few helpful command line utilities for dealing with images. The title is pretty self-descriptive.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rogers

item.title: Migrating Perforce to Plastic
item.description: Importing data and revisions from a Perforce server to Plastic.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rogers

item.title: Sam Law in The Revenge of the Ape Who Shall Not Be Named
item.description: A short adventure game I created based on a famous gorilla. The staler the meme is, the funnier it becomes.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rogers

item.title: Spotify on foobar2000
item.description: The lost art of using Spotify from something that isn't the Spotify client.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rogers

item.title: Who is Satoshi Nakamoto?
item.description: I had to write about something for a Contemporary Issues class. I wrote about Bitcoin.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rogers

item.title: I Made a RuneScape Bot
item.description: I've created a RuneScape bot to automatically drop certain items in your inventory. I may have too much free time.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rogers

item.title: Hamlet: The Movie: The Game
item.description: A video game I made for English class, very loosely based on Hamlet's To Be Or Not To Be soliloquy.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rogers

item.title: Rant Lite (a very bad idea)
item.description: A simple re-implementation of the Rant programming language in Javascript. How many horrible crimes against programming must I commit before someone makes a better IL -> JS converter?
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rogers

item.title: Richard 1.0 - Rant's New Scripting Engine
item.description: The programming language that you never asked for but might use anyways.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rogers

item.title: PSA: Node.js NPM Visual Studio Error
item.description: Solution to a common but annoying error for me.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rogers
